explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper applies algorithmic clustering models, which are a type of unsupervised learning, to identify managerial clusters from operational risk event descriptions.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions the use of several algorithmic clustering models to identify granular managerial clusters from the text data.
explanations.principal components analysis: The paper discusses dimensionality reduction methods, which could include principal components analysis (PCA), as part of the text analysis workflow.
explanations.feature representation: The paper involves text vectorization and semantic adjustment, which are processes related to feature representation in text analysis.
